key_changes: Enhanced checkbox checked logic to support indeterminate state
Modified onCheckedChange handler for select all functionality
Added support for 'indeterminate' state in checkbox rendering
Imported 'Minus' icon for indeterminate state visual representation
Updated render logic to show different icon based on checked state

patterns_discovered: Indeterminate checkbox state for partial selections
Dynamic checkbox rendering based on selection state
gotchas_discovered: Need to handle multiple selection scenarios (none, partial, all selected)
Ensuring type-safe handling of checkbox checked states

approach_outcome.description: Implement 'Select All' functionality in table header

recommendations: Consider extracting checkbox state logic into a reusable hook
Add unit tests to cover different checkbox state scenarios
Document the indeterminate state behavior for future developers
